## AdaptiveThreshold

###### Description

Applies an adaptive threshold to the input image,
 threshold will be applied to the given channel.
 [Original paper](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/220494200_Adaptive_Thresholding_using_the_Integral_Image)

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The source to be thresholded.|
|**uS?**|<var>number</var>|Size of the avarange box|
|**threshold?**|<var>number</var>|Percent of the diff to mark black in range 0-100|
|**channel?**|<var>number</var>|Channel to be applied|
|**tIntegralImage?**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|summed area table of the input|

###### Example

```js
gm.adaptiveThreshold(inputImage);
```
